octave

What is zoyster?

A style guide, not much of one really, but one none the less. Pretty much in the same vein as my other project, space-case, in that it mainly serves as a personal helper when building ideas.

As for the name? I just like saying it.

Logo

Ah yes, the oyster tongue logo. ;)
